welcome_message_body: Welcome to Pasarkemis, Indonesia! Get ready to experience the charm of our vibrant city, known for its bustling markets, rich cultural heritage, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Pasarkemis has to offer.

restaurants.name: Ayam Bakar Beda Rasa 'Ibu Iis'
restaurants.description: Ayam Bakar Beda Rasa 'Ibu Iis' is a indonesian restaurant located in South Tangerang.
restaurants.address: Jl. Raya Pasar Kemis, Desa Suka Asih, Banten

restaurants.name: Rumah Makan Ayam Bakar Bakakak 1
restaurants.description: Rumah Makan Ayam Bakar Bakakak 1 is a asian restaurant located in Cikupa.

restaurants.name: Martabak Bandung 999
restaurants.description: Martabak Bandung 999 is a sandwich spot located in Tangerang.
restaurants.address: Ruko Taman Puspa Blok E1 No.14 (Jl. Citra Raya Boulevard), Tangerang, Banten 15710

restaurants.name: Happy Home
restaurants.description: Happy Home is a chinese restaurant located in Tangerang.

restaurants.name: McDonald's
restaurants.description: McDonald's is a fast food restaurant located in Tangerang.
restaurants.address: Jl. Citra Raya Boulevard (Citra Raya, Cikupa), Tangerang, Banten

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Soekarno-Hatta International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Soekarno-Hatta International Airport, dedicated to serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Soekarno-Hatta International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but it may be slow and unreliable.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
